FOCUS_1_DESC: Hits required for Focus at Lv 2
FOCUS_2_DESC: Hits required for Focus at Lv 3
FOCUS_2S_DESC: Hits required for Enhanced Focus at Lv 3
FOCUS_D2S_DESC: Enhanced Focus damage modifier at Lv 3
SILK_COUNT_DESC: Increases number of Silk fragments produced
SILK_VALUE_DESC: Increases value of Silk fragments (default: 3 fragments = 1 silk)
CRIT_CHANCE_DESC: Percent chance of a critical hit
CRIT_DESC: Multiplier for damage of a critical hit
WANDERER_SLOT_DESC: Turns the Wanderer Crest's bottom yellow slot into a red slot
POGO_INV_DESC: Become invulnerable while down-slashing with the Beast Crest
FURY_CAP_DESC: Maximum masks healed by binding with the Beast Crest
BIND_SIZE_DESC: Modifier for the size of the Witch Crest's tentacle bind
LN_BIND_SIZE_DESC: Modifier for the size of the Witch Crest's tentacle bind with Longclaw equipped
WITCH_CAP_DESC: Maximum masks healed by binding with the Witch Crest
WITCH_REFUND_DESC: Refunds some Silk if the Witch Crest's bind misses
SHARD_DESC: Percent chance of enemies dropping Shell Shards on hit with Architect Crest
CRAFT_MASK_DESC: Number of masks healed by Craft Bind
NO_DROP_DESC: Skips the 'drop' portion of Shaman Crest's Bind
